title: Fullstack software engineer
desc1: Hey! I'm a Brazilian who is passionate about building high-impact, well-performing user experiences.
desc2: I believe that work is a big portion of my day, so I try to make the best out of it for me and my colleagues.
desc3: To achieve that I focus on empathy during conversations and try to deliver something I'm happy with.
howConfortable: How confortable I'm with each technology
nonExhaustive: Non-exhaustive list of languages, technologies and tools
basedonCEFR: Based on CEFR language proficiency levels

whatsetsmeapart.title: What sets me apart?
whatsetsmeapart.reason1: I demonstrate strong performance so colleagues can rely upon me.
whatsetsmeapart.reason2: I'm self-motivated with a passion for learning and using both front and back-end technologies.
whatsetsmeapart.reason3: I'm a systems thinker who can reason through systems and understand technical tradeoffs.

workexp.notlisted: There is one freelance working experience that is not listed.

bucksense.name: Bucksense
bucksense.desc: Developing a high-traffic cruise booking platform for Crystal Cruises with an international, cross-functional team.
bucksense.highlight1: Improved performance scores by ~20 points via image optimization, UI caching, and dynamic imports, enhancing booking flow speed and user experience.
bucksense.highlight2: Reduced Algolia API costs by ~30% through optimized caching, incremental static regeneration, and refined query strategies.
bucksense.highlight3: Strengthened payment gateway reliability with a comprehensive automated testing suite covering tax, currency, refund, and multi-country scenarios.

sejaGudi.name: Seja Gudi - Cultural Platform
sejaGudi.desc: Led end-to-end development of a sustainable cultural events platform integrating recycling incentives, payments, and event management.
sejaGudi.highlight1: Developed cross-platform applications using React Native (mobile) and Next.js (web), sharing business logic with a Supabase + Prisma backend.
sejaGudi.highlight2: Integrated geolocation for cultural event discovery and recycling points, including role-based admin dashboards for event management.
sejaGudi.highlight3: Connected Mercado Livre API for payments and reward redemption, enabling multi-currency support and sustainable monetization.

quattrus.name: Quattrus
quattrus.desc: Led the frontend migration from ExtJS to Next.js for enterprise management systems, aligning the company’s stack with modern web standards.
quattrus.highlight1: Eliminated ExtJS licensing costs and improved maintainability using a hybrid rendering strategy combining SSG and SSR.
quattrus.highlight2: Increased page load speed by ~40% and implemented CI/CD pipelines on Vercel with zero-downtime deployments.
quattrus.highlight3: Built a private design system with Tailwind CSS and ShadCN, and led development of an AI-powered business document interpretation platform.

alex.name: Alex Rohleder LTDA
alex.desc: Led migration of a legacy Create React App to Next.js for an energy company managing seasonal student programs.
alex.highlight1: Designed hybrid architecture allowing legacy and modern apps to coexist, sharing translation engines and business logic modules.
alex.highlight2: Enhanced caching strategies, optimized webpack configuration, and integrated Firebase for authentication and real-time features.
alex.highlight3: Established automated E2E, unit, and snapshot testing to reduce regression bugs and improve platform stability during seasonal peaks.

speedCast.name: Speedcast
speedCast.desc: Contributed to Speedcast Compass, an enterprise platform for monitoring and managing remote satellite networks.
speedCast.highlight1: Redesigned the legacy system into a modern, responsive web app with enhanced data visualization and usability.
speedCast.highlight2: Integrated ArcGIS API for real-time 3D satellite visualization and coverage monitoring directly within the main dashboard.
speedCast.highlight3: Developed modules to process and transform big data into downloadable reports (CSV, XLSX), supporting performance analysis.

switchApp.name: Switch App
switchApp.desc: Enhanced a hospitality recruitment platform connecting professionals to jobs across the service and hospitality sectors.
switchApp.highlight1: Developed and optimized payment slip and PDF management modules ensuring compliance with Brazilian payment standards.
switchApp.highlight2: Modernized UI components and refined layout responsiveness, resulting in higher user retention and engagement.
switchApp.highlight3: Collaborated with the product team to improve UX consistency and streamline the hiring flow experience.

lucalto.name: Lucalto
lucalto.desc: Contributed to the development and launch of Inkhall, a niche social network for tattoo artists and enthusiasts.
lucalto.highlight1: Helped bring the product from concept to production, enabling early adoption within the tattoo artist community.
lucalto.highlight2: Implemented authentication flows, database models, and responsive layouts using Next.js, Supabase, and Prisma ORM.
lucalto.highlight3: Gained strong full-stack development experience and improved collaboration skills in a startup environment.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.desc1: Simple online store built with Stripe integration

blog.title: Blog
blog.desc1: Create an account and manage posts

certificates.title: Certificate Issuing System
certificates.desc2: Certificates include student names and dates
certificates.desc3: Text/date fields can be positioned before email delivery

autofill.title: Automatic Job Application Autofill
autofill.desc1: Electron.js app for automatically filling out job application forms
autofill.desc2: Uses Puppeteer for automation and form submission

linkedinJobBot.title: WishApply - LinkedIn Job Application Bot
linkedinJobBot.desc1: Desktop app built with Electron.js and Node.js that uses AI to apply automatically for jobs on LinkedIn
linkedinJobBot.desc2: Searches job listings, fills forms, and generates personalized cover letters using AI models
linkedinJobBot.desc3: Released in 2025 as WishApply, simplifying the automated job application process
